statement.tex: %text FInd the projection of $\ora{a}$ on $\ora{b}$ if $\ora{a}\cdot \ora{b}=8$ and $\ora{b}=\vector{2}{6}{3}$. %

step.context: \text{Which dashed line in the figure shows the} \\ \text{projection of vector $\ora{A}$ on vector $\ora{B}$}.
step.reason: %text Projection of a $\ora{A}$ on $\ora{B}$ is the component of $\ora{A}$ in the direction of $\ora{B}$. %

step.context: %text If the angle between $\ora{a}$ and $\ora{b}$ is $\theta$, what is the component of $\ora{a}$ along $\ora{b}$? %
step.reason: %text If the projection of $\ora{a}$ along $\ora{b}$ is $a_b$ then, and the angle between $\ora{a}$ and $\ora{b}$ is $\theta$, then. % \cos\theta=\dfrac{a_b}{|\ora{a}|}\implies a_b=|\ora{a}|\cos\theta

step.context: %text If $\ora{a}\cdot \ora{b}=8$, $\ora{b}=\vector{2}{6}{3}$ what is $a_b=|\ora{a}|\cos\theta$? ($\theta$ is the angle between $\ora{a}$ and $\ora{b}$) %
